pullrequest.title: Add tutorials for hardware / simulation bridging (#337)

content.raw: I wouldn't have put them there, but they were there with the code that we received from the WPI team.  I believe that I removed them from the functions that get called frequently, where they cause continuous console spam.  I left the others in place because, given that I can't easily test this code, I'm trying to modify it as little as possible.
content.html: I wouldn't have put them there, but they were there with the code that we received from the WPI team. I left the others in place because, given that I can't easily test this code, I'm trying to modify it as little as possible.
